title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
CakePHP 3.4 prior to 3.4.14, 3.5 prior to 3.5.17, and 3.6 prior to 3.6.4 contains a cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the development only missing route and duplicate named route error pages.

References

  • https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/commit/1ea0c87de729e0dcd53eb6fe3bc86ba739121d8e
  • https://bakery.cakephp.org/2018/05/20/cakephp_364_3517_3414_released.html
  • https://github.com/FriendsOfPHP/security-advisories/blob/master/cakephp/cakephp/2018-05-20.yaml
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xwhj-pqcg-8rcr
items.title: [cakephp/cakephp] CakePHP vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting in some development error pages

items.content_html:
CakePHP 3.4 prior to 3.4.14, 3.5 prior to 3.5.17, and 3.6 prior to 3.6.4 contains a cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the development only missing route and duplicate named route error pages.

items.title: [cakephp/cakephp] CakePHP vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting in some development error pages

items.content_html:
CakePHP 2.x prior to 2.0.99, 2.1.99, 2.2.99, 2.3.99, 2.4.99, 2.5.99, 2.6.12, and 2.7.6 and 3.x prior to 3.0.15 and 3.1.4 is vulnerable to Remote File Inclusion through View template name manipulation.

References

  • https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/commit/5e60cc5d182e6131e3fbdfdf69f49d560c9ff78b
  • https://bakery.cakephp.org/2015/11/05/cakephp_3015_314_2612_276_released.html
  • https://github.com/FriendsOfPHP/security-advisories/blob/master/cakephp/cakephp/2015-11-05.yaml
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p76f-wr22-4rv6

items.title: [cakephp/cakephp] CakePHP vulnerable to Remote File Inclusion through View template name manipulation

items.content_html:
Unconventional URL paths would allow direct access to prefixed actions without setting the correct request parameters.

References

  • https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/commit/056f24a77428ad35e23cab6840a72b7c25c4ccc0
  • https://bakery.cakephp.org/2015/08/06/cakephp_2_5_9_2_6_10_2_7_2_released.html

  • https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/releases/tag/2.7.2
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6hg4-vp5q-47mw
